description: Completed a comprehensive course on machine learning covering supervised and unsupervised learning.
Learned data science techniques and tools, including data manipulation, visualization, and statistical analysis.
Acquired skills in full stack web development including front-end and back-end technologies.
Learned graphic design principles and tools to create visually appealing designs.
Completed a course on mobile app development using React Native and other relevant technologies.
Gained proficiency in Python programming specifically for data science applications.
Studied machine learning algorithms and their applications in real-world scenarios.
Learned web development technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Introduction to blockchain technology and its applications in various industries.
Advanced course on Solidity programming language and smart contract development.
